entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a person who lunged across the table. He was hit by a spell from his companion.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being pushed sideways onto her bench by Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who cast spells to defend himself and others.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as a group of people who were casting spells.

entities.name: waitress
entities.description: A waitress is mentioned as screaming and running for the door.

relationships.description: Ron pushed Hermione sideways onto her bench.
Harry defended himself against the Death Eaters' spells.
The Death Eater attacked Ron with a spell.
